t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = input().split()
    s = input()
    lst = []
    for j in range(n):
        if s[j] == '0':
            lst.append(int(a[j]))
    lst.sort()
    print(lst[0])

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    binn = input()
    p = []
    p1 = 0
    p2 = 0
    for j in range(len(l)):
        if binn[j] == '0':
            p.append(l[j])
    print(min(p))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    N = int(input())
    l = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(l)
    V = list(input())
    ind = 0
    ll = []
    while ind < N:
        if V[ind] == '0':
            ll.append(l[ind])
        ind += 1
    print(min(ll))

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    S = map(int, input().split())
    V = input()
    print(min([i for (i, j) in zip(S, V) if j == '0']))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = list(map(int, input().split()))
    v = input().strip()
    zeros = v.count('0')
    if zeros == 0:
        print(min(s))
    else:
        zero_indices = [j for j in range(n) if v[j] == '0']
        min_val = min([s[j] for j in zero_indices])
        print(min_val)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = list(map(int, input().split()))
    v = input()
    print(min([s[i] for i in range(n) if v[i] == '0']))

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    s = list(map(int, input().split()))
    v = input()
    min = 101
    i = 0
    for i in range(len(s)):
        if s[i] < min and v[i] == '0':
            min = s[i]
    print(min)
    t -= 1

for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = input()
    a = []
    c = 0
    for i in s:
        if i == '0':
            a.append(l[c])
        c = c + 1
    print(min(a))
